name: Game Of Thrones: The Complete Third Season (Widescreen)

reviews.name: Game Of Thrones: The Complete Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I have pre-ordered the first 2 seasons each year from HBO thinking I would get the best deal... last summer a friend told me that Wal Mart had also sold each season. I paid clost to $65 from HBO, and got this season 3 set for lest then half the price. Never again HBO...
reviews.title: Best Buy..

reviews.name: Game Of Thrones: The Complete Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
ship to store scheduled to take 2 weeks-- even though product is stocked in store. Indicated that was shipped 3 days after order but 2 weeks later it is still not at the store. Shipping tracker does not work and no confirmation when will arrive.

Recommend avoiding using ship-to-store given the ridiculous timelines and their inability to meet them.
reviews.title: Product is excellent but ship2store is a joke

reviews.name: Game Of Thrones: The Complete Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.title: A MUST for every video collection!

reviews.name: Game Of Thrones: The Complete Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Was very happy to be able to purchase this DVD set at a much lower price than availble in stores. Had to wait awhile for it to arrive in the store. But, the wait was definitely worth the reduced price.
reviews.title: love the show!

reviews.name: Game Of Thrones: The Complete Third Season (Widescreen)
reviews.title: Left me wanting more
